original_text: Shelomith and his relatives were in charge of all the treasuries for the things dedicated by King David, by the heads of families who were the commanders of thousands and commanders of hundreds, and by the other army commanders.
korean_text: 이 슬로못과 그의 형제는 성물의 모든 곳간을 맡았으니 곧 다윗 왕과 가문의 우두머리와 천부장과 백부장과 군대의 모든 지휘관이 구별하여 드린 성물이라

sentences.original_text: Shelomith and his relatives were in charge
sentences.korean_translation: 셀로미스와 그의 친척들이 책임을 맡고 있었다

sentences.original_text: of all the treasuries for the things dedicated
who were the commanders of thousands
and by the other army commanders
